oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Curly Fox and Texas Ruby (color separation, 1st application)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Fox, Curly, 1910-1995; Texas Ruby; Woodcuts (prints);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: One color one sheet (pink on white) featuring the first application of color for the husband-and-wife team of Curly Fox and Texas Ruby, stars of the Grand Ole Opry tent show poster. Each color is achieved by carving into individual woodblocks. Each application of color requires a separate pass through the printing press. Poster features a woodcut of Texas Ruby and Curley Fox.
